title: Optimize the Queue
body: Optimize your shit Queue I accepted the game and after a few sec. it says that i declined, btw I had a 20 min. bann too so I think I dont wanna waste 40 min. for a shit like that.

replies.body: There hasn't been any issues with the queue, but an unstable connection to champion select can cause you to lose sync and get left behind.  Constantly missing the queue can result in a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your connection and prevent further misses.  Hope it helps!
